summary: The module extracts scenario results, computes differences in health metrics (e.g., DALYs, deaths, appointment counts) between treatment sets, and generates a series of bar and horizontal bar charts with confidence intervals to visualise the impact of each treatment scenario for an overview paper.
business_intent: Provide quantitative evidence on how individual treatment interventions alter population health outcomes and healthâ€‘system utilisation, supporting policy makers and researchers in assessing the effectiveness of each treatment option.
